Finger Jam

For the final Game Design project, we were given a theme that we had to design a multi-player game around. Our theme for Finger Jam was humor. After a lot of brainstorming, we thought about how weird and funny twister is. We wanted to translate this game to a digital form and continue the awkwardness of twister with fingers. We wanted to learn more about the interaction between humor and frustration. So, for Finger Jam we put some obvious elements of humor with the music and imagery, but we also added elements that made aspects of the game impossible. I was responsible for coding the game. The source code can be viewed here.

  • Role: Developer
  • Client: Game Design
  • Tools: Unity
  • Year: 2015
